item.title: mosh 1.4.0, rebuilt from mosh-1.4.0-1.el9.src.rpm for Amazon Linux 2023
item.description:
mosh 1.4.0, rebuilt from mosh-1.4.0-1.el9.src.rpm for Amazon Linux 2023

mosh-1.4.0-1.amzn2023.x86_64.rpm

If you want to rebuild yoursrlf, just download mosh-1.4.0-1.el9.src.rpm from Fedora and run rpmbuild --rebuild mosh-1.4.0-1.el9.src.rpm.

rpmbuild is available on the rpm-build package.
